summary: This is a Federal Bureau of Prisons prisoner remand form, likely for Jeffrey Epstein, used to document his arrest and initial commitment to a Metropolitan Correctional Center or Metropolitan Detention Center. The form captures standard booking information including charges, demographics, and arrest details.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The form is a prisoner remand document, and the name field is filled with 'Jeffrey Epstein', indicating he is the individual being processed into federal custody.

events.title: Epstein's Arrest and Remand to Federal Custody
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is processed into the federal prison system using a standard Bureau of Prisons remand form, documenting his arrest and initial commitment.

locations: MCC/MDCs (Metropolitan Correctional Center / Metropolitan Detention Centers)
keyFacts: This is a Bureau of Prisons form (BP-S377.050) used to officially remand a prisoner into federal custody.
The form is filled out for Jeffrey Epstein, confirming his status as a federal prisoner.
The document indicates the arresting officer is required to complete the form prior to committing the prisoner to an MCC or MDC facility.
The form captures detailed information including charges, demographics, physical description, and emergency contacts.
The document is part of the official record of Epstein's incarceration within the federal prison system.
